title: Forgotton Anne
notes:
Performance:
- Runs at ~25 fps at 1080p (scaled to 4k)
Errors:
- Null pointer access at shutdown (with popup and crash dump)
- Some keys stop working after alt-tab in fullscreen mode (using xfwm4)
Workarounds:
- xact (for audio) and maybe .NET 4.0 + 4.7
- Launch options: PROTON_USE_WINED3D11=1 PULSE_LATENCY_MSEC=20 %command%
- Had to recreate ~/.local/share/Steam/steamapps/common/Forgotton Anne/ThroughLine Games/Forgotton Anne after wiping it.

title: Forgotton Anne
notes: With Nvidia driver 390 game launched in a small window (had to switch to another window in order to restore it to fullscreen) but crashed after the first in-game video. With Nvidia driver 396.54 it will not launch.

title: Forgotton Anne
notes: With Nvidia Driver 390 the game started in a very small window (had to switch to another window to restore it to fullscreen) the game crashed after the first in-game video. With the Nvidia Driver 396 the game did not launch at all.
